overview: Jill and Chris, a sizzling monogamous lesbian couple, take a weekend retreat to spice up their sex life. They are put into immediate counseling by the world-renowned sex therapist Dr. Tina Cage to test the strength of their relationship. Will it hold up? Or will the seduction of the other beautiful, sexy resort guests ruin their love forever? Betrayal is just a few fingers, a stiff tongue, and a toy or two away!
title: Babes Illustrated 14
